name: Too Lazy to Think of a Title
name_original: Too Lazy to Think of a Title
description:
This game was made for the Low Effort Jam 20. It was made with the effort of trying to understand Unity programming in about a month. That is kind of high effort but we took it easy.

You are trapped in a limbo with a bunch of awful objects that will tell you their stories. Click on the to hear them. 

Unfortunately in this current state the game erases the dialogue screen when a dialogue is finished so you'll have to restart the game for each dialogue. Sorry :(

Credits:

Programming and Visuals: Perpetua Franck

Music: Jeremias Cerrone

Huge thanks to https://martinisla.itch.io/  and Joaquin Gaviot for lending a hand with the programming!
